alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Gadsden; Inland Bay; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Jackson; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 7:08AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Jackson, northern Gulf, eastern Bay and Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida, western Gadsden, Liberty and northwestern Franklin Counties in Big Bend of Florida through 800 AM EDT/700 AM CDT/... At 708 AM EDT/608 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles south of Marianna to near Callaway. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Callaway, Blountstown, Greensboro, Stonemill Creek, Tyndall Air Force Base, Chattahoochee, Orange, Wewahitchka, Sneads, Gretna, Bristol, Altha, Rock Bluff, Honeyville, Moose Pond, Clarksville, Ocheesee, Juniper, Douglas City and Selman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Gadsden; Inland Bay; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Jackson; Liberty
